about_the_game:
This game will tell you a creepy story of an anthropologist Michael, who one evening received a letter from his colleague. The letter talks about the location of ancient excavations in an abandoned mine, in it was discovered burial of Turkic shamans. Not thinking long our hero goes to the place of meeting, but does not find traces of his colleagues in the camp of expeditors. Hurrying to understand the situation, he descends deep into the mine in search of answers.

Game features:

- Lack of Screamers. The game is not going to scare you, as scare the usual horror films or games.

- Psychological Horror. The game will have an oppressive atmosphere and the player will feel what it is like to be alone in the dark surrounded by unknown danger. What of what is seen or heard will be true, the player will decide for himself. Perhaps it is a raft of your imagination, and perhaps the deadly danger and the truth lurks around the corner.

- Several plot endings. If you will pass the game carefully you will be able to make the right choice.

- Defence against the unknown. Your enemy is yourself, irrational terror will haunt you until the end of the game.

short_description: The story of a young anthropologist who sets out on an expedition to investigate the disappearance of a group of scientists at an ancient excavation site. Creepy atmosphere and a constant sense of persecution will not let him go the rest of the way.
